channel.title: Events on CIRCULODEMAJALIS
channel.description: Recent content in Events on CIRCULODEMAJALIS

item.title: Arbor Day 2026
item.description: On the 20th of March we will celebrate Arbor Day!

item.title: Lunch gathering at Moinho Novo 2025
item.description: On November 30, we held our second MAJALIS lunch gathering at the beautiful Herdade do Moinho Novo, which our member José Carlos kindly made available free of charge.

item.title: Creativity Day 2025: "Despertares"
item.description: On November 17, another event organized by CIRCULODEMAJALIS was held at the Canha Ethnographic Museum, entitled “Despertares” (Awakening), celebrating creativity day

item.title: Book launch "A voz dos montes e outros poemas" by Gabriel Mendes
item.description: The launch of Gabriel Mendes’ book took place in the beautiful Chapel of St. Anthony (Pátio D’Água), which was very well organized by Mrs. Fernanda Pinho from the Montijo City Council.

item.title: Canha Medieval Fair 2025
item.description: For three days, Canha, known for its tranquility and natural beauty, was transformed into a true medieval setting.

item.title: Exposição "Aves em Canha" no Montijo
item.description: From June 26 to July 2, 2025, during the St. Peter festivities in Montijo, CIRCULODEMAJALIS was present with the traveling exhibition “Aves em Canha” by Cristina Archer.

item.title: IIⁿᵈ Majalis Anniversary
item.description: On May 17th, we celebrated our Majalis Anniversary.

item.title: World Tree Day 2025
item.description: On March 21st, at the invitation of the CIRCULODEMAJALIS Association and jointly organized with the Canha Ethnographic Museum, magic happened!

item.title: Lunch at the Herdade do Moinho Novo
item.description: On November 24th, following the event “Rendilhadas”, we had our get-together at Herdade do Moinho Novo, whose space was generously made available to the Association by the owner. As we were already in the Advent, it was also our Christmas meeting.

item.title: Rendilhadas / Creativity Day 2024
item.description:
MAJALIS celebrates Creativity Day annually, recognizing that each person’s creativity is the surest tool for adapting to social changes and facing the challenges of new times, ensuring a life of quality.

This principle is one of the pillars of our work, which we wish to continue to develop.

item.title: Exposition / Book Launch "Memórias com Asas"
item.description: In September 2024, we held the presentation of the book “Memórias com Asas” (Memories with Wings) and the exhibition “Aves em Canha” (Birds in Canha) at our headquarters, which was still undergoing the necessary renovations.

item.title: World Tree Day 2024
item.description: To celebrate this day, we created a special bonsai tree with the help of the community. This collective work was made from recycled materials from other construction projects (pipes, coatings, wood, nets, etc.), as well as leftover wool and wool purchased by all the participants.

item.title: Festa de Canha / Exposição "Momento"
item.description: So we began with the first MAJALIS Exhibition in 2023… Organized by Ricardo Cruzes and curated by architect Carlos Ribeiro at the Ethnographic Museum of Canha.

item.title: Iˢᵗ Majalis Anniversary
item.description:
Our anniversary is celebrated in May, on a date to be determined.

And it is in May because the lily of the valley (our Majalis) is the flower of May. However, this first anniversary was celebrated on June 1.
